summary: There alot of secret knowledge in this world waiting to be uncovered.
descriptionHtml:
Books of Secret Knowledge: Focus on adding new un-lore-friendly story book\'s whit secret knowledge just waiting for you to uncovered it.



To find the first book you must travel to Riverwood and go to the smith workshop the book is on the table where the armor is can\'t miss it.

Like this mod? Why not track it as i will be adding more book\'s and perhaps even a quest if you guys desire it;)

---------
Update:
---------
None yet
---------

---------
Bugs
---------
None known
---------

Have questions or need help?
Just comment in the comment section and i will return to you as fast as possible

You can also send me an Email
MonarchFlag@hotmail.com

Install
-------
Just drop the esp in the Data folder
Go to Data files in your Skyrim Launcher and check \"Books of Secret Knowledge\"
Press ok
Play and Enjoy
-------

----------
Uninstall
----------
Just delete the Books of Secret Knowledge.esp in your Data folder
----------
author: CrazyWolfGamer
